name: hsa-rocr-dev

variants.name: image
variants.description: build with or without image support

description:
This repository includes the user mode API nterfaces and libraries
necessary for host applications to launch computer kernels to available
HSA ROCm kernel agents.AMD Heterogeneous System Architecture HSA - Linux
HSA Runtime for Boltzmann (ROCm) platforms.

dependencies.name: cmake
dependencies.description:
A cross-platform, open-source build system. CMake is a family of tools
designed to build, test and package software.

dependencies.name: xxd
dependencies.description:
Vim is a highly configurable text editor built to enable efficient text
editing. It is an improved version of the vi editor distributed with
most UNIX systems. Vim is often called a "programmer's editor," and so
useful for programming that many consider it an entire IDE. It's not
just for programmers, though. Vim is perfect for all kinds of text
editing, from composing email to editing configuration files.

dependencies.name: elf
dependencies.description:
elfutils is a collection of various binary tools such as eu-objdump, eu-
readelf, and other utilities that allow you to inspect and manipulate
ELF files. Refer to Table 5.Tools Included in elfutils for Red Hat
Developer for a complete list of binary tools that are distributed with
the Red Hat Developer Toolset version of elfutils.

dependencies.name: hsakmt-roct
dependencies.description:
This is a thunk python recipe to build and install Thunk Interface.
Thunk Interface is a user-mode API interfaces used to interact with the
ROCk driver.

dependencies.name: llvm-amdgpu
dependencies.description:
Toolkit for the construction of highly optimized compilers, optimizers,
and run-time environments.

dependencies.name: rocm-device-libs
dependencies.description: set of AMD specific device-side language runtime libraries

dependent_to.name: rocprim
dependent_to.description: Radeon Open Compute Parallel Primitives Library

dependent_to.name: aluminum
dependent_to.description:
Aluminum provides a generic interface to high-performance communication
libraries, with a focus on allreduce algorithms. Blocking and non-
blocking algorithms and GPU-aware algorithms are supported. Aluminum
also contains custom implementations of select algorithms to optimize
for certain situations.

dependent_to.name: rdc
dependent_to.description: ROCm Data Center Tool

dependent_to.name: petsc
dependent_to.description:
PETSc is a suite of data structures and routines for the scalable
(parallel) solution of scientific applications modeled by partial
differential equations.

dependent_to.name: yaksa
dependent_to.description:
Yaksa is a high-performance datatype engine for expressing, managing and
manipulating data present in noncontiguous memory regions. It provides
portable abstractions for structured noncontiguous data layouts that are
much more comprehensive compared with traditional I/O vectors. Yaksa
imitates parts of the MPI Datatype system, but adds additional
functionality that would allow it to be used independent of MPI. It
provides routines for packing/unpacking, creating I/O vectors (array of
contiguous segments) and flattening/unflattening datatypes into process-
portable formats. Yaksa's backend includes support for CPUs as well as
different GPUs.

dependent_to.name: rocminfo
dependent_to.description: Radeon Open Compute (ROCm) Runtime rocminfo tool

dependent_to.name: hpx-kokkos
dependent_to.description: HPXKokkos is an interoperability library for HPX and Kokkos

dependent_to.name: hiop
dependent_to.description:
HiOp is an optimization solver for solving certain mathematical
optimization problems expressed as nonlinear programming problems. HiOp
is a lightweight HPC solver that leverages application"s existing data
parallelism to parallelize the optimization iterations by using
specialized linear algebra kernels.

dependent_to.name: mfem
dependent_to.description: Free, lightweight, scalable C++ library for finite element methods.

dependent_to.name: sundials
dependent_to.description:
SUNDIALS (SUite of Nonlinear and DIfferential/ALgebraic equation
Solvers)

dependent_to.name: roctracer-dev
dependent_to.description:
ROC-tracer library: Runtimes Generic Callback/Activity APIs. The goal of
the implementation is to provide a generic independent from specific
runtime profiler to trace API and asyncronous activity.

dependent_to.name: papi
dependent_to.description:
PAPI provides the tool designer and application engineer with a
consistent interface and methodology for use of the performance counter
hardware found in most major microprocessors. PAPI enables software
engineers to see, in near real time, the relation between software
performance and processor events. In addition Component PAPI provides
access to a collection of components that expose performance measurement
opportunities across the hardware and software stack.

dependent_to.name: ceed
dependent_to.description:
Ceed is a collection of benchmarks, miniapps, software libraries and
APIs for efficient high-order finite element and spectral element
discretizations for exascale applications developed in the Department of
Energy (DOE) and partially supported by the Exascale Computing Project
(ECP). This is a Spack bundle package that installs the CEED software
components.

dependent_to.name: tasmanian
dependent_to.description:
The Toolkit for Adaptive Stochastic Modeling and Non-Intrusive
ApproximatioN is a robust library for high dimensional integration and
interpolation as well as parameter calibration.

dependent_to.name: neko
dependent_to.description:
Neko: A modern, portable, and scalable framework for high-fidelity
computational fluid dynamics

dependent_to.name: rccl
dependent_to.description:
RCCL (pronounced "Rickle") is a stand-alone library of standard
collective communication routines for GPUs, implementing all-reduce,
all-gather, reduce, broadcast, and reduce-scatter.

dependent_to.name: rocm-debug-agent
dependent_to.description: Radeon Open Compute (ROCm) debug agent

dependent_to.name: hydrogen
dependent_to.description:
Hydrogen: Distributed-memory dense and sparse-direct linear algebra and
optimization library. Based on the Elemental library.

dependent_to.name: hip-rocclr
dependent_to.description:
Hip-ROCclr is a virtual device interface that compute runtimes interact
with to different backends such as ROCr or PAL This abstraction allows
runtimes to work on Windows as well as on Linux without much effort.

dependent_to.name: arborx
dependent_to.description: ArborX is a performance-portable library for geometric search

dependent_to.name: slate
dependent_to.description:
The Software for Linear Algebra Targeting Exascale (SLATE) project is to
provide fundamental dense linear algebra capabilities to the US
Department of Energy and to the high-performance computing (HPC)
community at large. To this end, SLATE will provide basic dense matrix
operations (e.g., matrix multiplication, rank-k update, triangular
solve), linear systems solvers, least square solvers, singular value and
eigenvalue solvers.

dependent_to.name: rocm-openmp-extras
dependent_to.description: OpenMP support for ROCm LLVM.

dependent_to.name: chai
dependent_to.description: Copy-hiding array interface for data migration between memory spaces

dependent_to.name: rocprofiler-dev
dependent_to.description: ROCPROFILER library for AMD HSA runtime API extension support

dependent_to.name: hpctoolkit
dependent_to.description:
HPCToolkit is an integrated suite of tools for measurement and analysis
of program performance on computers ranging from multicore desktop
systems to the nation's largest supercomputers. By using statistical
sampling of timers and hardware performance counters, HPCToolkit
collects accurate measurements of a program's work, resource
consumption, and inefficiency and attributes them to the full calling
context in which they occur.

dependent_to.name: hpx
dependent_to.description: C++ runtime system for parallel and distributed applications.

dependent_to.name: strumpack
dependent_to.description:
STRUMPACK -- STRUctured Matrix PACKage - provides linear solvers for
sparse matrices and for dense rank-structured matrices, i.e., matrices
that exhibit some kind of low-rank property. It provides a distributed
memory fully algebraic sparse solver and preconditioner. The
preconditioner is mostly aimed at large sparse linear systems which
result from the discretization of a partial differential equation, but
is not limited to any particular type of problem. STRUMPACK also
provides preconditioned GMRES and BiCGStab iterative solvers.

dependent_to.name: nekrs
dependent_to.description:
nekRS is an open-source Navier Stokes solver based on the spectral
element method targeting classical processors and hardware accelerators
like GPUs

dependent_to.name: ecp-data-vis-sdk
dependent_to.description: ECP Data & Vis SDK

dependent_to.name: exago
dependent_to.description:
ExaGO is a package for solving large-scale power grid optimization
problems on parallel and distributed architectures, particularly
targeted for exascale machines.

dependent_to.name: heffte
dependent_to.description: Highly Efficient FFT for Exascale

dependent_to.name: atmi
dependent_to.description:
Asynchronous Task and Memory Interface, or ATMI, is a runtime framework
and programming model for heterogeneous CPU-GPU systems. It provides a
consistent, declarative API to create task graphs on CPUs and GPUs
(integrated and discrete).

dependent_to.name: amr-wind
dependent_to.description:
AMR-Wind is a massively parallel, block-structured adaptive-mesh,
incompressible flow sover for wind turbine and wind farm simulations.

dependent_to.name: care
dependent_to.description: Algorithms for chai managed arrays.

dependent_to.name: amrex
dependent_to.description:
AMReX is a publicly available software framework designed for building
massively parallel block- structured adaptive mesh refinement (AMR)
applications.

dependent_to.name: rocm-bandwidth-test
dependent_to.description: Test to measure PciE bandwidth on ROCm platforms

dependent_to.name: dihydrogen
dependent_to.description:
DiHydrogen is the second version of the Hydrogen fork of the well-known
distributed linear algebra library, Elemental. DiHydrogen aims to be a
basic distributed multilinear algebra interface with a particular
emphasis on the needs of the distributed machine learning effort, LBANN.

dependent_to.name: camp
dependent_to.description:
Compiler agnostic metaprogramming library providing concepts, type
operations and tuples for C++ and cuda

dependent_to.name: mpich
dependent_to.description:
MPICH is a high performance and widely portable implementation of the
Message Passing Interface (MPI) standard.

dependent_to.name: xsdk
dependent_to.description:
Xsdk is a suite of Department of Energy (DOE) packages for numerical
simulation. This is a Spack bundle package that installs the xSDK
packages

dependent_to.name: tau
dependent_to.description:
A portable profiling and tracing toolkit for performance analysis of
parallel programs written in Fortran, C, C++, UPC, Java, Python.

dependent_to.name: ginkgo
dependent_to.description:
High-performance linear algebra library for manycore systems, with a
focus on sparse solution of linear systems.

dependent_to.name: umpire
dependent_to.description:
An application-focused API for memory management on NUMA & GPU
architectures

dependent_to.name: superlu-dist
dependent_to.description:
A general purpose library for the direct solution of large, sparse,
nonsymmetric systems of linear equations on high performance machines.

dependent_to.name: lbann
dependent_to.description:
LBANN: Livermore Big Artificial Neural Network Toolkit. A distributed
memory, HPC-optimized, model and data parallel training toolkit for deep
neural networks.

dependent_to.name: mlirmiopen
dependent_to.description: Multi-Level Intermediate Representation for rocm miopen project.

dependent_to.name: kokkos
dependent_to.description:
Kokkos implements a programming model in C++ for writing performance
portable applications targeting all major HPC platforms.

dependent_to.name: aomp
dependent_to.description: llvm openmp compiler from AMD.

dependent_to.name: elpa
dependent_to.description: Eigenvalue solvers for Petaflop-Applications (ELPA)

dependent_to.name: magma
dependent_to.description:
The MAGMA project aims to develop a dense linear algebra library similar
to LAPACK but for heterogeneous/hybrid architectures, starting with
current "Multicore+GPU" systems.

dependent_to.name: vtk-m
dependent_to.description:
VTK-m is a toolkit of scientific visualization algorithms for emerging
processor architectures. VTK-m supports the fine-grained concurrency for
data analysis and visualization algorithms required to drive extreme
scale computing by providing abstract models for data and execution that
can be applied to a variety of algorithms across many different
processor architectures.

dependent_to.name: libceed
dependent_to.description: The CEED API Library: Code for Efficient Extensible Discretizations.

dependent_to.name: trilinos
dependent_to.description:
The Trilinos Project is an effort to develop algorithms and enabling
technologies within an object-oriented software framework for the
solution of large-scale, complex multi-physics engineering and
scientific problems. A unique design feature of Trilinos is its focus on
packages.

dependent_to.name: dbcsr
dependent_to.description: Distributed Block Compressed Sparse Row matrix library.

dependent_to.name: blaspp
dependent_to.description:
C++ API for the Basic Linear Algebra Subroutines. Developed by the
Innovative Computing Laboratory at the University of Tennessee,
Knoxville.

dependent_to.name: gasnet
dependent_to.description:
GASNet is a language-independent, networking middleware layer that
provides network-independent, high-performance communication primitives
including Remote Memory Access (RMA) and Active Messages (AM). It has
been used to implement parallel programming models and libraries such as
UPC, UPC++, Co-Array Fortran, Legion, Chapel, and many others. The
interface is primarily intended as a compilation target and for use by
runtime library writers (as opposed to end users), and the primary goals
are high performance, interface portability, and expressiveness.
***NOTICE***: The GASNet library built by this Spack package is ONLY
intended for unit-testing purposes, and is generally UNSUITABLE FOR
PRODUCTION USE. The RECOMMENDED way to build GASNet is as an embedded
library as configured by the higher-level client runtime package (UPC++,
Legion, etc), including system-specific configuration.

dependent_to.name: fftx
dependent_to.description:
FFTX is the exascale follow-on to the FFTW open source discrete FFT
package for executing the Fast Fourier Transform as well as higher-level
operations composed of linear operations combined with DFT transforms.

dependent_to.name: hypre
dependent_to.description:
Hypre is a library of high performance preconditioners that features
parallel multigrid methods for both structured and unstructured grid
problems.

dependent_to.name: upcxx
dependent_to.description:
UPC++ is a C++ library that supports Partitioned Global Address Space
(PGAS) programming, and is designed to interoperate smoothly and
efficiently with MPI, OpenMP, CUDA, ROCm/HIP and AMTs. It leverages
GASNet-EX to deliver low-overhead, fine-grained communication, including
Remote Memory Access (RMA) and Remote Procedure Call (RPC).

dependent_to.name: hip
dependent_to.description:
HIP is a C++ Runtime API and Kernel Language that allows developers to
create portable applications for AMD and NVIDIA GPUs from single source
code.

dependent_to.name: rocm-opencl
dependent_to.description: OpenCL: Open Computing Language on ROCclr

dependent_to.name: ratel
dependent_to.description: Extensible, performance-portable solid mechanics with libCEED and PETSc

dependent_to.name: raja
dependent_to.description: RAJA Parallel Framework.

dependent_to.name: pika
dependent_to.description: C++ runtime system for parallellism and concurrency.

dependent_to.name: rocm-dbgapi
dependent_to.description:
The AMD Debugger API is a library that provides all the support
necessary for a debugger and other tools to perform low level control of
the execution and inspection of execution state of AMD's commercially
available GPU architectures.

dependent_to.name: slepc
dependent_to.description: Scalable Library for Eigenvalue Problem Computations.
